prf_utils::CorrelationEvaluator

prf_utils::CorrelationEvaluator Class Reference

#include <statistics.hh>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

double operator() (std::vector< double > &v1, std::vector< double > &v2)
 Find correlation between vectors v1 and v2.

Detailed Description

Evaluates the non-normalized correlation <uv>-<u><v> between to vectors of doubles, u and v.

Usage: (for vectors v1 and v2 of double precision values CorrelationEvaluator corr; double correlation= corr(v1,v2);
